DataElement.preferredName: Participant Non-carious tissue change, Gingival Recession, Occlusal Injury Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes or no indication of whether the patient had non-carious cervical lesions, gingival recession or obvious occlusal trauma.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Non-carious tissue change, Gingival Recession, Occlusal, Injury Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the presence of non-carious cervical lesions, gingival recession, or obvious occlusal trauma in the participant

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Property.preferredName: Non-carious Tissue Change Gingival Recession Occlusal Surface Injury Present
Property.preferredDefinition: An abnormal tissue change in a tooth that does not involve caries.:A loss of gum tissue resulting in an exposure of the roots of the teeth.:The biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.:Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: An abnormal tissue change in a tooth that does not involve caries.
A loss of gum tissue resulting in an exposure of the roots of the teeth.
The biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.
Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/15/08 - Associated NCIt concets for Yes/No instead of Meta.  Superceded existing VD.
